languages.text: {n}Кибелла хмурится, всматриваясь в металлическую тварь.{/n} "Если нечистый зверь вздумает противиться воле твоей, Домин, я отправлю его в небытие. И оборву нить любого из подданных твоих, кого запятнает скверна зверя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла хмурится, всматриваясь в металлическую тварь.{/n} "Если нечистый зверь вздумает противиться воле твоей, Домин, я отправлю его в небытие. И оборву нить любого из подданных твоих, кого запятнает скверна зверя".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah glowers at the metal creature.{/n} "If the unclean beast dares to defy your command, Domin, I will cast it into oblivion. And I will swiftly sever the thread of any of your subjects who may become sullied by its corruption."
languages.original_text: {n}Кибелла хмурится, всматриваясь в металлическую тварь.{/n} "Если нечистый зверь вздумает противиться воле твоей, Домин, я отправлю его в небытие. И оборву нить любого из подданных твоих, кого запятнает скверна зверя".

{n}Kibellah glowers at the metal creature.{/n} "If the unclean beast dares to defy your command, Domin, I will cast it into oblivion. And I will swiftly sever the thread of any of your subjects who may become sullied by its corruption."

{n}Kibellah glowers at the metal creature.{/n} "If the unclean beast dares to defy your command, Domin, I will cast it into oblivion. And I will swiftly sever the thread of any of your subjects who may become sullied by its corruption."

{n}Kibellah glowers at the metal creature.{/n} "If the unclean beast dares to defy your command, Domin, I will cast it into oblivion. And I will swiftly sever the thread of any of your subjects who may become sullied by its corruption."

{n}Kibellah glowers at the metal creature.{/n} "If the unclean beast dares to defy your command, Domin, I will cast it into oblivion. And I will swiftly sever the thread of any of your subjects who may become sullied by its corruption."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah fulmina con la mirada a la criatura de metal.{/n} «Si la bestia inmunda se atreve a desafiar sus órdenes, Domin, la arrojaré al olvido. Y cortaré con rapidez todo hilo de cualquiera de sus súbditos si la corrupción lo ha mancillado».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah glowers at the metal creature.{/n} "If the unclean beast dares to defy your command, Domin, I will cast it into oblivion. And I will swiftly sever the thread of any of your subjects who may become sullied by its corruption."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah fulmina con la mirada a la criatura de metal.{/n} «Si la bestia inmunda se atreve a desafiar sus órdenes, Domin, la arrojaré al olvido. Y cortaré con rapidez todo hilo de cualquiera de sus súbditos si la corrupción lo ha mancillado».

languages.text: {n}キベラは金属製の生き物をにらみつけた。{/n}「不浄な獣がご命令に背くようなら、ドミン、我はそれを忘却の彼方へと追放しましょう。そして、その堕落によって穢される可能性のある臣民の糸を速やかに断ち切ります」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah glowers at the metal creature.{/n} "If the unclean beast dares to defy your command, Domin, I will cast it into oblivion. And I will swiftly sever the thread of any of your subjects who may become sullied by its corruption."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは金属製の生き物をにらみつけた。{/n}「不浄な獣がご命令に背くようなら、ドミン、我はそれを忘却の彼方へと追放しましょう。そして、その堕落によって穢される可能性のある臣民の糸を速やかに断ち切ります」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈怒视着眼前的金属怪物。{/n}“如果这只不洁的孽畜胆敢违抗你的命令，秘者，我会让它归于湮灭。而且，我会找到那些可能被它腐化的臣民，将他们的丝线迅速切断。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah glowers at the metal creature.{/n} "If the unclean beast dares to defy your command, Domin, I will cast it into oblivion. And I will swiftly sever the thread of any of your subjects who may become sullied by its corruption."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈怒视着眼前的金属怪物。{/n}“如果这只不洁的孽畜胆敢违抗你的命令，秘者，我会让它归于湮灭。而且，我会找到那些可能被它腐化的臣民，将他们的丝线迅速切断。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah funkelt die metallene Kreatur an.{/n} "Wenn die unreine Bestie es wagt, Euren Befehl zu missachten, Domin, werde ich sie in die Vergessenheit stürzen. Überdies werde ich den Faden aller Eurer Untertanen durchtrennen, die sich ihrer Verderbnis hingegeben haben."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah glowers at the metal creature.{/n} "If the unclean beast dares to defy your command, Domin, I will cast it into oblivion. And I will swiftly sever the thread of any of your subjects who may become sullied by its corruption."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah funkelt die metallene Kreatur an.{/n} "Wenn die unreine Bestie es wagt, Euren Befehl zu missachten, Domin, werde ich sie in die Vergessenheit stürzen. Überdies werde ich den Faden aller Eurer Untertanen durchtrennen, die sich ihrer Verderbnis hingegeben haben."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah jette un coup d'œil assassin à la créature de métal.{/n} « Si la bête impure ose ignorer votre ordre, Domin, je lui ferai connaître l'oubli. Comme je trancherai vivement le fil de n'importe lequel de vos sujets qu'elle corrompra. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah glowers at the metal creature.{/n} "If the unclean beast dares to defy your command, Domin, I will cast it into oblivion. And I will swiftly sever the thread of any of your subjects who may become sullied by its corruption."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah jette un coup d'œil assassin à la créature de métal.{/n} « Si la bête impure ose ignorer votre ordre, Domin, je lui ferai connaître l'oubli. Comme je trancherai vivement le fil de n'importe lequel de vos sujets qu'elle corrompra. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, metalden yaratığa dik dik bakıyor.{/n} "Eğer ki bu uğursuz yaratık komutana karşı gelmeye cüret ederse onun canını alacağım. Yozlaşmasıyla tebaandan her kimi lekelediyse onun da ipliğini derhâl koparacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah glowers at the metal creature.{/n} "If the unclean beast dares to defy your command, Domin, I will cast it into oblivion. And I will swiftly sever the thread of any of your subjects who may become sullied by its corruption."
